name: Animatu Multimedia
overview: Animatu Multimedia, S.L. designs and develops games and applications for mobile phones. It also develops original games content, as well as works for hire and development of licensed or branded content. Its entertainment applications support multiple wireless handsets to serve mobile phone manufacturers, aggregators, distributors, and media companies worldwide. The company also offers mobile marketing services, including WAP/I-MODE portal or web development for mobile phones, graphic solutions for mobile phones, interactive application development design, proximity marketing, Bluetooth device/Bluetooth transmitter installation and maintenance, personalized marketing publicity design, specialized promotion services, SMS message and alert system development, and content design, development and administration. Its games are available through mobile operators and distribution partners. Animatu Multimedia, S.L. is based in Bilbao, Spain.
